title: Vinyl
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Vegetarian and fish. Cafe, art hub, micro venue, and licensed bar serving coffee, smoothies, cakes, paninis. Has 2 floors of records with seating and artwork on display. Live entertainment and dancing. Dog and child-friendly. Opens till later on weekends and when live music is on. 2 minutes from 2 stations and 10 minutes walk from both Greenwich and New Cross.
